languages.text: Клановая реликвия семейства Эрэбис верно служила прежним хозяевам при абордажах пустотных судов. На корпусе выгравирована надпись: "Да сохранят Нааки и Маттис свет ваших душ".

traits.locale_text: Клановая реликвия семейства Эрэбис верно служила прежним хозяевам при абордажах пустотных судов. На корпусе выгравирована надпись: "Да сохранят Нааки и Маттис свет ваших душ".

languages.text: This Erebis clan relic served its erstwhile owners faithfully as they boarded voidships. Engraved into it are the words, "May Naaki and Mattis preserve the light of your souls."
languages.original_text: Клановая реликвия семейства Эрэбис верно служила прежним хозяевам при абордажах пустотных судов. На корпусе выгравирована надпись: "Да сохранят Нааки и Маттис свет ваших душ".

traits.locale_text: This clan relic of the Erebis family served its erstwhile owners faithfully as they boarded voidships. Engraved into its body are the words, "May Naaki and Mattis preserve the light of your souls."
This clan relic of the Erebis family served its erstwhile owners faithfully as they boarded voidships. Engraved into its body are the words, "May Naaki and Mattis preserve the light of your souls."

This Erebis clan relic served its erstwhile owners faithfully as they boarded voidships. Engraved into it are the words, "May Naaki and Mattis preserve the light of your souls."
This Erebis clan relic served its erstwhile owners faithfully as they boarded voidships. Engraved into it are the words, "May Naaki and Mattis preserve the light of your souls."

languages.text: Cette relique du clan Erebis a fidèlement servi ses anciens propriétaires lorsqu'ils se lançaient à l'abordage de vaisseaux spatiaux. Les mots suivants y sont gravés : « Puissent Naaki et Mattis préserver la lumière de vos âmes ».
languages.original_text: This Erebis clan relic served its erstwhile owners faithfully as they boarded voidships. Engraved into it are the words, "May Naaki and Mattis preserve the light of your souls."

traits.locale_text: Cette relique du clan Erebis a fidèlement servi ses anciens propriétaires lorsqu'ils se lançaient à l'abordage de vaisseaux spatiaux. Les mots suivants y sont gravés : « Puissent Naaki et Mattis préserver la lumière de vos âmes ».

languages.text: Esta reliquia del clan Erebis ha servido fielmente a sus antiguos dueños cuando embarcaron en naves del vacío. En ella están grabadas las palabras: «Que Naaki y Mattis preserven la luz de vuestras almas».
languages.original_text: This Erebis clan relic served its erstwhile owners faithfully as they boarded voidships. Engraved into it are the words, "May Naaki and Mattis preserve the light of your souls."

traits.locale_text: Esta reliquia del clan Erebis ha servido fielmente a sus antiguos dueños cuando embarcaron en naves del vacío. En ella están grabadas las palabras: «Que Naaki y Mattis preserven la luz de vuestras almas».

languages.text: このエレビス家の遺物は、ヴォイドシップに乗り込む際、以前の持ち主に忠実に仕えた。「ナアキとマティス、魂の光を守らんことを」と彫ってある。
languages.original_text: This Erebis clan relic served its erstwhile owners faithfully as they boarded voidships. Engraved into it are the words, "May Naaki and Mattis preserve the light of your souls."

traits.locale_text: このエレビス家の遺物は、ヴォイドシップに乗り込む際、以前の持ち主に忠実に仕えた。「ナアキとマティス、魂の光を守らんことを」と彫ってある。

languages.text: 来自伊雷比斯氏族的圣物，忠实地侍奉着每位登上虚空舰的持有者，上面铭刻着这样的字样：“愿拿基与马蒂斯守护你灵魂中的光辉。”
languages.original_text: This Erebis clan relic served its erstwhile owners faithfully as they boarded voidships. Engraved into it are the words, "May Naaki and Mattis preserve the light of your souls."

traits.locale_text: 来自伊雷比斯氏族的圣物，忠实地侍奉着每位登上虚空舰的持有者，上面铭刻着这样的字样：“愿拿基与马蒂斯守护你灵魂中的光辉。”

languages.text: Dieses Relikt des Erebis-Clans diente seinen früheren Besitzern bei ihren Raumschiffreisen treu. Es ist ein Satz hineingraviert: "Mögen Naaki und Mattis das Licht Eurer Seelen bewahren."
languages.original_text: This Erebis clan relic served its erstwhile owners faithfully as they boarded voidships. Engraved into it are the words, "May Naaki and Mattis preserve the light of your souls."

traits.locale_text: Dieses Relikt des Erebis-Clans diente seinen früheren Besitzern bei ihren Raumschiffreisen treu. Es ist ein Satz hineingraviert: "Mögen Naaki und Mattis das Licht Eurer Seelen bewahren."

languages.text: Erebis klanına ait bu yadigâr, eski sahiplerine uçsuz gemilerinde seyahat ettikleri zamanlarda hizmet etmişti. Üzerine "Naaki ve Mattis, ruhlarınızın ışığını korusun." sözleri kazınmış.
languages.original_text: This Erebis clan relic served its erstwhile owners faithfully as they boarded voidships. Engraved into it are the words, "May Naaki and Mattis preserve the light of your souls."
